title: PERMA BANNED?
body:
So after taking a good 3-4 month break for league. Maybe even longer than that. I come back to a pleasant surprise which indicates "This account has been banned for the use of prohibited third-party software."

Now I can guarantee I have never used anything to give me an unfair advantage in the game. Unless youtube music is consider 3rd party then I have no Idea whats going on. Im a trash iron player that one tricks yas, and was pretty good at it! Apparently carrying yourself out of a rank you don't deserve gets you a ban?
